levels.description: Stops attacking; DEF <@ba.vup>+{bison_s_2[self].def:0%}</>, increases the DEF of allies in the adjacent 4 tiles by <@ba.vup>+{bison_s_2[ally].def:0%}</>, and increases the likelihood of being targeted by enemy attacks
